title: Corporate Card and Expense Specialist
overview: The Corporate Card and Expense Specialist position at Netflix in Mexico City is responsible for handling corporate card charge inquiries, managing the corporate card program, assisting with employee-related inquiries and projects, and day-to-day management of corporate card and vendor relationships.
description:
At Netflix, we are shaping the future of entertainment by bringing top-quality global content to virtually every country around the world. Members can play, pause and resume watching, all without commercials or commitments. As we expand globally, we continue to look for the best and brightest talent to help us scale. Visit our culture deck and long-term view to learn more about the unique Netflix culture and the opportunity to be part of our team.Â 

Our Global Expense & Corporate Card Operations team is searching for an operations professional to support the global business. This position is located in Mexico City and will be responsible for providing an excellent employee experience for all Netflix Expense & Corporate Card related inquiries from around the globe. The ideal candidate will be detail oriented, organized, able to process a large volume of corporate card orders and inquiries, and will possess excellent communication skills.Â 

This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a stellar global team and part of a fast-paced and growing international company.Â

extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Field and respond to corporate card charge inquiries related to expense report creation and submissions in Workday for Netflix employees from around the world.
Manage administration of the corporate card program, including but not limited to issuance of new cards, increases in card limits, fraud charge inquiries and lost cards.
Assist expense team analysts regarding employee-related inquiries and projects.
Assist in employee outreach and engagement related activities.
Day-to-day management of corporate card management and vendor relationships.
